----------------------------------------------------------------------------- Namespace: DotNetNuke.Modules.Html Project: DotNetNuke Class: HtmlTextUserController -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
The HtmlTextUserController is the Controller class for managing User information the HtmlText module
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Compares if two WorkflowStatePermissionInfo objects are equivalent/equal
a WorkflowStatePermissionObject true if the permissions being passed represents the same permission in the current object
This function is needed to prevent adding duplicates to the WorkflowStatePermissionCollection. WorkflowStatePermissionCollection.Contains will use this method to check if a given permission is already included in the collection.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GetTopHtmlText gets the most recent HtmlTextInfo object for the Module, Workflow, and State
The ID of the Module Whether the content has been published or not
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
UpdateHtmlText creates a new HtmlTextInfo object or updates an existing HtmlTextInfo object
An HtmlTextInfo object The maximum number of versions to retain
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
CreateUserNotifications creates HtmlTextUser records and optionally sends email notifications to participants in a Workflow
An HtmlTextInfo object
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
UpdateWorkFlowID updates the currently active WorkflowID for the Portal
The ID of the Module The ID of the Portal The ID of the Workflow
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
UpdateWorkFlowID updates the currently active WorkflowID for the Portal
The ID of the Portal The MaximumVersionHistory
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
ImportModule implements the IPortable ImportModule Interface
The ID of the Module being imported The Content being imported The Version of the Module Content being imported The UserID of the User importing the Content
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

DesktopModulePermissionCollection provides the a custom collection for WorkflowStatePermissionInfo objects
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GetWorkflowStatePermissionsCallBack gets a Dictionary of WorkflowStatePermissionCollections by WorkflowState from the the Database.
The CacheItemArgs object that contains the parameters needed for the database call
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
FillWorkflowStatePermissionDictionary fills a Dictionary of WorkflowStatePermissions from a dataReader
The IDataReader
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
HasWorkflowStatePermission checks whether the current user has a specific WorkflowState Permission
The Permissions for the WorkflowState The Permission to check
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GetWorkFlowStates retrieves a collection of WorkflowStateInfo objects for the Workflow from the cache
The ID of the Workflow
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GetWorkFlowStatesCallback retrieves a collection of WorkflowStateInfo objects for the Workflow from the database
Arguments passed by the GetWorkflowStates method
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GetPreviousWorkFlowStateID retrieves the previous StateID for the Workflow and State specified
The ID of the Workflow The ID of the State
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GetNextWorkFlowStateID retrieves the next StateID for the Workflow and State specified
The ID of the Workflow The ID of the State
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
